name: @papicandela/mcx-cli
description: CLI for the MCX framework - MCP Code Execution
author: papicandela

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --env disable --external @opentui/core --external @opentui/react --external @opentui-ui/dialog --external @opentui-ui/toast --external react --external react-reconciler && bun run add-shebang
scripts.add-shebang: bun -e "const f=Bun.file('dist/index.js');const c=await f.text();if(!c.startsWith('#!'))await Bun.write('dist/index.js','#!/usr/bin/env bun\n'+c)"
